hypothesis_content.title: DeFi 'Safety' Flight in BTC Stress
hypothesis_content.statement: During a STRESS regime triggered by a sharp BTC drop (>8% in 3 days), capital flows from high-beta DeFi alts (AVAX, GRT, CRV) into the most liquid and 'blue-chip' DeFi token (ETH) and the leading decentralized stablecoin governance token (CRV, for DAI/USDC liquidity). A long ETH/AVAX position combined with a long CRV/GRT position will outperform a pure altcoin basket over the following 10 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In crypto-wide stress, DeFi investors do not exit entirely but rotate within the ecosystem towards perceived 'safer' or more fundamental DeFi assets (ETH as base layer, CRV for stablecoin system criticality) away from higher-beta, narrative-driven alts.
entry_conditions: Regime shifts to STRESS (BTC down >8% in 3 days)
AVAX 10-day beta to BTC > 1.5 (confirmed high beta)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Combined position (ETH/AVAX + CRV/GRT) achieves a 6% net gain
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Combined position suffers a 4% net loss
exit_conditions.time_exit: 10 trading days after entry or when regime exits STRESS

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: During stress, all DeFi assets collapse in tandem with alts, or capital flees entirely to stablecoins/USD, showing no intra-DeFi rotation.
